Package org.icepdf.core.pobjects.acroform.signature

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SignatureSigner
    Placeholder for singer interface.
    SignatureValidator
    Interface for Digital Signature validation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPkcsValidator
    PKCS#1 and PKCS#7 are fairly close from a verification point of view so we'll use this class for common functionality between PKCS#1 and PKCS#7.
    AlgorithmIdentifier
    Utility method for mapping the hard to read DigestAlgorithmIdentifier to the more descriptive layman form.
    DigitalSignatureFactory
    DigitalSignatureFactory which takes a SignatureDictionary and returns the appropriate validator or signer implementation.
    Pkcs1Validator
    "adbe.x509.rsa_sha1" In this case, the Contents key contains a DER-encoded PKCS#1 [11] binary data object representing the signature obtained as the RSA encryption of the byte range SHA-1 digest with the signer's private key.
    Pkcs7Validator
    Pkcs7Validator is based on the RFC3852 specification for Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS).
